corrode.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if metal corrodes, or if something corrodes it, it is slowly destroyed by the effect of water, chemicals etc
corrode.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Acidic water will corrode the pipes.
corrode.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to gradually make something weaker or destroy it completely
corrode.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Corruption has corroded our confidence in the police force.
